name: Mention
description: Mention component is used to refer someone or something.

properties.name: trigger
properties.label: Trigger
properties.handlerDescription: It is a handler to set trigger keywords.

properties.name: suggestions
properties.label: Suggestions
properties.handlerDescription: It is a handler to set an array of suggestions to display.
properties.settingTooltip: Specifies an array of suggestions to display.

properties.name: field
properties.label: Field
properties.handlerDescription: It is a handler to set a field of a suggested object to resolve and display.
properties.settingTooltip: Defines a field of a suggested object to resolve and display.

properties.name: scrollHeight
properties.label: Scroll Height
properties.settingTooltip: The maximum height of the suggestions panel.

properties.name: autoHighlight
properties.label: Auto Highlight
properties.settingTooltip: Highlights the first item in the list by default.

properties.name: placeholder
properties.label: Placeholder
properties.settingTooltip: Defines a placeholder of the component.

properties.name: delay
properties.label: Delay
properties.settingTooltip: Defines a delay (ms) between keystrokes to wait before sending a query.

properties.name: autoresize
properties.label: Autoresize
properties.settingTooltip: Enables automatic resizing of the textarea.

properties.name: rows
properties.label: Rows
properties.settingTooltip: Defines a number of rows of the component.

properties.name: cols
properties.label: Cols
properties.settingTooltip: Defines a number of columns of the component.

properties.name: hideField
properties.label: Hide Filed
properties.handlerDescription: It is a handler to determine which fields will not showed in suggestions.
properties.settingTooltip: Determines which fields will not show in suggestions.

eventHandlers.name: onChange
eventHandlers.label: On Change Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is triggered when the value changes.

eventHandlers.name: onFocus
eventHandlers.label: On Focus Event

eventHandlers.name: onBlur
eventHandlers.label: On Blur Event

eventHandlers.name: onShow

eventHandlers.name: onHide
